alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Chilton (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 5:56PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN AUTAUGA AND EASTERN CHILTON COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM CST... At 556 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chilton County Motor Sports Park to Pooles Crossroads to near Vida Junction. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clanton, Thorsby, Billingsley, Plecher, Marbury, Gap Of The Mountain, Lay Lake Dam, Higgins Ferry Park, Verbena, Pooles Crossroads, Mitchell Lake, Lay Lake, Lomax, I 65 Rest Area, Mitchell Dam, New Prospect, Isabella, Dawson Mill, and Cooper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
